title: Onboard a New Attorney
description: A new attorney is joining the firm. The practice manager needs to set them up in all firm systems.

tasks.description: Create a user account for the new attorney in the time and billing system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The attorney can now record their time.

tasks.description: Create a user account in the document management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The attorney can now access client files.

tasks.description: Add the new attorney to the firm's conflicts database.
tasks.expected_outcome: The attorney is now included in all future conflicts checks.
